name: UpdateReleaseNote
description:
Update an existing release note in Freshservice.

This tool updates an existing note on a specified release in Freshservice. Call this when you need to modify the content of a release note within the platform.

parameters.name: release_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the release to be updated.

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the note to be updated.

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the note to update.

parameters.name: user_id_of_note_creator
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: An array of email addresses to notify about the updated release note.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_html_body
parameters.description: The HTML content of the note to be updated. Use valid HTML format.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_plain_text
parameters.description: The content of the release note in plain text format, without any HTML tags.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_created_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was initially created, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_at
parameters.description: Date and time when the note was updated, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-03-27T14:00:00Z').

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
